description: As long as my friends are smiling, I can keep smiling! So c'mon, let's see a nice big smile on your face!
Friends help friends out! You can always come to me if you're in trouble—I'll come up with something!
Gotta stay full of energy! But when you're tired, it's best to get some rest. Me? I'm not sleepy yet!
Hey, wanna hear a secret? When I'm with you, life seems twice as fun! Eheheh... Thanks a bunch!
It's weird... Sometimes I get this fuzzy feeling in my chest. I haven't caught a cold or something, have I?!
I wanna get stronger! That way I can make sure we all stay smiling forever!
I don't mind getting a little beaten up! As long as I know you've got my back, I can always keep fighting!
Just having you nearby fills me with a million times my usual energy! ...OK, maybe not quite that much.
I can hear your voice cheering me on... Even when we're apart, I can always tell you're there for me!
No matter who I'm up against, I feel like I can't lose! Not now that I have someone to support me!
Happy birthday, Mr. Knight! What kind of present you after? Food? Equipment? Or... I know! Let's train together!
Happy birthday to you! Here, have this cat charm! It'll watch over you even when I'm not around!
U-um... You want to hang out with me? Are you sure? Well... thanks!
If you're heading to battle, I'll handle healing and support! As for attacking, um... I might need some help.
P-please, don't stare at me like that... It's embarrassing... Ahhhh...
Are you feeling hungry? Let me know when you are! I can always whip up a little snack!
Do you need help with anything? If you're heading off somewhere, I'd love to keep you company...
Let me know if there's anything you need me for! I can heal up little cuts and scratches in no time!
If it's for your sake, Mr. Knight, I... I feel like I can go the extra mile!
Healing light, come forth! H-huh? Just seeing my face makes you feel better? Stop... You're making me blush...
Hmm, what kind of magic should I study next? L-love magic, maybe? N-no, I'm sure there's no such thing!
I've been learning protective magic! Spells to protect from fire, cold, heat... And, um, fish bones. They can really hurt your throat...
Mr. Knight! Happy birthday! Um, I... I made you a cake! I hope it tastes alright...
Happy birthday, Mr. Knight! I made a cake, and lots of other treats so we can all celebrate together!
I'll put in as much effort as it takes to achieve my goals. I think that's a good attitude to have—you should try it too.
Could you help me come up with a new training plan? I'm trying to find a good location...
The desire to become stronger is what matters. As long as you don't lose sight of it, you'll become stronger too.
I'm not sure why, but when I cross swords with you, it feels almost like dancing.
Do you want to go fishing with me? I enjoy fishing alone as well, but I'd like to share it with you...
Ready your weapon! If you ever plan to land a clean blow on me, there's no time to waste!
That unrelenting look in your eyes... You really are quite something. I knew I was right about you.
You can become so much stronger—I know you haven't reached your limit yet. So go ahead and prove it to me.
(Such an odd feeling... It's like I want to keep doing this forever. But that's not realistic, of course.)
I know I said I would do anything you asked... But nothing indecent, all right?
Happy birthday. I'm afraid I wasn't sure what to get you for a present... How about we go out somewhere instead?
I hear it's your birthday, so let's take a break from training today. ...Hmm? Does that not make you happy?
Oh, hey there, mister! What d'you wanna play today?
Urghhhh... I accidentally ate my own super-spicy prank candy...
Yay, my prank's all ready to go! Now if I just wait for him to show up... Gah! Did you see the whole thing?
I set up pranks... You fall for them... Yep, we're the perfect team!
Let's play together lots and lots more! It's a promise! C'mon, you gotta pinky swear!
Misogi Explorers, assemble! ...Pretty easy to assemble when it's just the two of us, huh?
I'm looking forward to toying with you lots and lots more! Ah, sorry, I meant "playing with." Honest!
C'mon, mister! Hurry up! Let's go exploring! I've been waiting for you!
Since I like you so much, I'm gonna come up with lots more pranks just for you!
When I play with you, it's almost like I've got a big brother! I love it!
Happy birthday, mister! Here's your present! And here's your cake! Go on, open them! Heheheh...
Happy birthday! I love you, mister! Honest! ...Maybe it's hard to believe me after I pranked you so many times...
If you're ever in trouble,\nyou can always call on me!\nI may only be an apprentice knight, but I'm a hero at heart!
Let's go take down some evil organizations! We're still barely halfway to being true heroes, but two halves make a whole!
My mom and dad always want me to wear cute outfits. All covered in ribbons and lace... Simple and practical is more my style!
We should go somewhere quiet together once in a while. Even heroes need to rest sometimes!
I really wanna play with you\nall day long! But if we get any closer, you'll find out my...\nN-no! I didn't say anything!

Haaahhhh!
As long as we have the
courage to stand up to evil,
justice will always prevail!
Yeeeaahhh! I'm getting fired up! Let's blaze down the path to true herodom!

If world peace is at stake,
I won't lose to any villain!
A true hero never goes back
on her word!
With the courage you give me,\nI'll transform into the world's greatest hero!
Being with you gives me a hundred... no, a million times\nmy usual courage!\nSo you gotta stick with me!
Huh? It's your birthday today?! Then I'll give you my coolest\nTora Tiger merch!\nIt's a token of our friendship!
Happy birthday!\nI brought a special Tora Tiger cupcake just for you!\nI even baked it myself...
Say, would you come help me with my saxophone practice later?
*pant... pant...* That's enough sax for now... You really know how to wear a girl out...
What? You want to keep going? But I'm so worn out... I don't have much more in me...
You always push me so hard, it makes me all sweaty... My heart's pounding like crazy...
Say, if you had to choose between me and my sister, which would you... Ah, no, it's nothing.
Heheh, look what I can do! Put on a little jazzy music for the... Akari Pole-Dance Extravaganza!
You really want to see me do it, huh? Okay then... It's a little embarrassing, but... Here I go! Akari 360° Flip!
*pant... pant...* My poor body can't take any more... With you cheering me on, I might have gone a bit too far!
N-now I'm feeling dizzy... Hold me tight before I fall over! It's the least you can do after putting me in this state!
I wouldn't let just anyone see me do all this, you know? You're special, that's why I want to show you... everything.
Oh! Is it just me, or does something about you seem a little... bigger today? You're making me get all excited!
It's your special day today, isn't it? Happy birthday! Now we can do even more... grown-up things together!
My favoritest thing is pudding! Second up is pudding, third and fourth is pudding, and fifth is... more pudding!
Flying through the air is the best! Playing tricks is the best too! But pudding... Pudding is the bestestest!
Monsters were chasing me! I thought I was a goner! But then I remembered, I'm already a goner!
Me, I'm a ghost! So if you mess up and die, I'll still be your friend! Isn't that the bestest? No?
Today's the day! You promised we can go out and play! I'm gonna haunt you alllll day long!
Pudding pudding pudding pudding! Buy me more pudding! Else I might pass on from starvation!
No touching that pudding! That's Miyako's pudding! If you sneak a nibble, Miyako haunts you all night!
Ghosts are for scaring people! That's what we do! C'mon, look a bit more scared!
Grrr! Which do you care about more?! Miyako or pudding?! ...You love both? Wow! That makes sense!
Why's it just me that's a ghost?! You should kick some buckets and be a ghost too! Then we'll be together for ever and ever!
Even ghosts know birthdays are special! So let's have a big birthday pudding party!
Happy birthday! Birthdays are for eating special treats with special friends! So... It's pudding cake day!
Ooh, perfect timing! You'll never believe this, but I just found an angle that makes me look even cuter! Take a look!
When word of my beauty spreads, tourists will come from far and wide to get a glimpse. I'd better make a guidebook!
Help, please! My beauty keeps radiating out! It's out of my control! Help me stop it! No, wait, that would be too cruel!
I hope you appreciate having someone as cute as me by your side! You're basically the luckiest guy in the world!
I stay by your side because that's where I want to be. Not just because you make me look even cuter by comparison!
Alas... All the jewels and treasures in the world pale before my beauty... What a tragic life I lead...
Ahhh, look how beautiful I am! So beautiful, it's like... like... Oh, it's no use! I'd need to create new words to express it!
Don't be embarrassed that you're not as beautiful as me. That's just as natural as the sky being blue.
Perhaps someday I'll give you a present more precious than any jewel. I mean myself, of course. Would that make you happy?
The precious joy of having me by your side... The gleaming world we'll create together... Truly, the world is brimming with hope.
Happy birthday! You're looking absolutely, positively, undoubtedly splendid today. The second place podium is yours for the taking. ♪
Happy birthday! ♪ My beauty is all yours to admire for the day. I just hope you can fully appreciate it.
The time is nigh for you too to reawaken to your past self! My greatest of allies and direst of foes... Sigurd of the Fulgor!
Have you committed my true name to memory? It is I, Annerose von Stechpalm!
Urgh...! My eye burns with the energy of the dark magicks sealed within! ...No, I don't need any eye drops!
Dearest Sigurd... Though this world is not our own, the bond we forged on the battlefield yet endures! Hahahahah!
Join with me, and let us crush the ambitions of the Syndicate! Only once our destiny is fulfilled can we reforge our lost bonds of m-matrimony...
Witness the shape of despair! This is my forbidden art... The Ultimate Magick of Infinite Annihilation!
If you have special techniques of your own, be sure to unleash them with flair! Let me demonstrate...
When the magicks gathered in my accursed eye spark forth, all enemies shall meet their doom!
By purging my defenses, I achieve the ultimate offensive mode! Annihilation Forme! W-wait, stop staring!
Dearest Sigurd... Thanks to you, I have kept sight of my true self. You have... my thanks.
On this, the anniversary of your rebirth, I grant you this gift! Behold: the Sigil of the Darkest Knights! Pretty cool, isn't it?
Ah, Sigurd! Happy birthday! For your present, I bestow upon you a journal to record our exploits!\nYou... can actually write, yes?
There ya are, my prince! I just fixed myself some tea, want some?
You oughtta know every girl dreams of livin' in a fairyland. With a Prince Charming by her side, of course!
It's a prince's job to protect his princess, ya know. Any fairy tale could tell you that.
If you ever get yourself hurt, I've got a little spell that'll fix you right up. Pain, pain, go away! ♪
First thing I do when I wake up is to say good mornin' to the little birdies outside.
Twinkle twinkle hoy!☆ Ooh, looks like we're in a dingy ol' cave... But my magic's brightened the place up! Kinda pretty, ain't it?
You're gonna lead me by the hand? Well gee, that's real lovely of you... I'll light up the way ahead so we can find our way to safety!
As long as we're together, I'll light your way! So don't you let a little dark get you down, my prince!
When I'm with my prince, the whole world's like a fairy tale! Will ya whisk me off on an adventure?
Let's just keep on walkin'! Even if one of us trips up, we'll be fine as long as we're together—right, my prince?
Happy birthday, my prince! Ain't nothin' that makes me happier than spending such an important day together with you. ♪
It's your birthday? Well, ain't that a big event! Big enough that I wanna make today a national holiday in the Maho-Maho Kingdom!
We're siblings even if we aren't blood relatives, big bro. Huh? You don't follow?
60% of the time, I hit my target every time! Huh? That means my aim's bad?!
I'd love to go on a candy shop tour with you one of these days. What do you say?
I feel like I can do anything when you're with me, big bro! Let's keep going!
I feel like our bond has really gotten strong, big bro. I hope you feel the same way.
I heard it's "chili outside" today. We should go eat some before it's all gone!
I need to work on my aim. I don't wanna look lame in front of my big bro!
They say you should "learn by chewing." Can you cook up a treat to help me study?
Hee hee. At the rate I'm going, I'll hit the bull's-eye on your heart soon, big bro!
If anyone lays a finger on you, I'll snipe 'em with this bow, big bro!
Are you having a great birthday? C'mon, Big Bro, special days are for spending with family! Let's throw a proper party together!
Happy birthday! No matter how many years pass or how old we get, you'll always be my big bro, and I'll be your little sister!
If you ever need anything, come straight to me! I'll help out with all my powers!
A good sleep and I'm raring to go! Don't lollygag or I'll leave you in the dust!
*yawn* I'm a little sleepy, but I'm triple-A-okay! Wahey! ☆
*mumble* Shiori, you're so soft and comfy... Huh? Wait, that was you?
Love and peace! I'll take out monsters in one shot with my telekinesis! I'm tough!
Hey, you wanna take a nap next to me? We've got a bed of grass, all warmed up by the sun!
After I use my powers a lot, I recharge with the power of the land! My batteries are full!
Hee hee! Being with you makes me feel all warm and happy inside... And sleepy. *yawn*
*mumble* Feels nice when you're here... Good dreams tonight...
I think I must've had a good dream. You were there. Maybe I saw our future? Hee hee.
I can't think of a better present than letting you sleep on my super comfy lap! ☆ Hm? Weird. I'm feeling bit tired myse— Zzz...
Happy birthday! I'll use my superpowers to throw you a big celebratio— Wait. That'll just make me tired, so... *nibble* ♪
I love doing my regular rounds! There's nothing more hype than discovering a rare spellbook! Come on, join me in my world!
Wahah! Gotta bury my face in dakis of my favorite characters! It's the only way to recharge my energy!
I'm a magical girl who defends the peace! And that means protecting all lives equally...\nEven overgrown kids like us!
You're always helping me out, so I oughtta treat you to a meal once in a while! All righty, you can leave the bill to me!
I just want to bring smiles to everyone's faces like a true magical girl should! And that definitely includes you!
Just as despair rears its head, our heroine awakens the power of a new spellbook! Next time: Nanaka Dies in Magma! Don't miss it!
When I try a new spell for the first time, it always sets my heart racing! And if the spell actually works, I'm over the moon!
This spell is my last resort, fueled by my own life force... Haha...\nI'll always live on in your heart...\nAren't scenes like that the best?!

If you and me fight in tandem,
no enemy stands a chance!
We're best buds and comrades!
One magical girl in two parts!
My magical girl story wouldn't be complete without you, my trusty partner! We'll become a legend and protect the world together!
Happy birthday! This is my present to you! 185 volumes of my top manga recs! ...Um, you think you can carry them home?
Hey, birthday boy! Take this pair of glasses as a present! Go on,\ntry them on! ...Yep! Perf-tastic!\nYou've never looked sharper!
A new volume of my favorite mystery series is coming out soon! Care to give it a read? I'll lend you the whole set!
What say we spend the day as just friends? An active mind needs some good rest now and then. ♪
Detective work turns your lifestyle upside down, makes you spend whole days walking around, and requires major patience to boot. But you're doing pretty well, I'd say.
There's not a case the two of us can't solve if we're together!
I always worked alone before I met you. And to be honest? I much prefer things the way they are now.
Woo! You'd best not underestimate the power of Caon's finest detective! ♪
No incident goes unsolved. No perpetrator roams free. The finest detective in the land, Kasumi, is on the case!
I'm not one for violence, but I'm more than willing to take matters into my own hands if the case requires it!
We've reached the point where I consider you an important partner, even outside of our detective work. ♪
A great detective needs a great assistant, and you fill that role perfectly. I'm able to do what I do thanks to your help.
It's your special day? Happy birthday! Let's wrap things up for today and throw you a big party!
It's your birthday, so what say you take on the role of detective for the day? So, Mr. Detective! What sort of case are you pursuing today? Hehe. ♪
Aww, did you come to see me? Hee hee. I'm so happy!
What sort of book should I read today? What type is your favorite?
Hee hee. Think of me as something of a surrogate mother.
Aww, what a good boy. I'll always be right here by your side. ♪
I'll always be on your side, no matter what happens. So don't be afraid to let yourself be spoiled.
If you're ever having a tough time, you can always come to me. I'll be here to help.
You're doing such a great job! I'm always watching how hard you work. Good boy!
Oh no, are you hurt? Let me see that. I'll make it better. Pain, pain, go away!
I'll be your personal teacher for the day. Don't tell the kids, of course. Otherwise they might get jealous. ♪
It makes me so happy to hear that you feel at ease around me. There's always a pleasant warmth in my heart when you're around, too.
Today is a very special day. Happy birthday! You have no idea how much it means to me to celebrate with you. ♪
Happy birthday! Today's a special day, so feel free to ask for anything you want. I'll spoil you as much as need be.
Whattup, whiz-boy? I was hoping you could help me with my math again?
How much of the times table do you know? All of it?! Forget smart, you're a brain genius!
I'm gonna be a model at an event today. You should come and see me!
Talking to you makes me feel, like, warm and relaxed. No, I mean it! Totes for reals!
Whattup, whiz-boy? Wanna eat lunch together? Lemme take you to this hot new spot I found!
My arrow of love will pierce the hearts of all my fans. Including you, of course!
I've got the best new pose for my next shoot. What do you think? Strong but cute, right?
Ooh, the ocean's never looked prettier! Maybe it's because I'm here with a special someone?
My model friends think you're my BF! How funny is that? I mean, not that I'd... Oops!
You don't have to treat me special just 'cause I'm a model. To me, your smarts are cooler!
Happy birthday! I'mma throw you a big birthday bash! That'd kinda make us look like a couple, huh?
It's your birthday today, right? Then let's have a big party with everyone at school! Though it might be even more fun with just the two of us.
Haitai! Always feels good to give a lively greeting!
I get things done in my own sweet time! Rushing through life never helped anyone!
Goya and soki and sata andagi! I sure do miss the food from back home!
When I'm adventuring with you, I know everything's gonna be right as rain!
I wanna take you to see my hometown someday! The glistening waves, the sparkling white sand... I know you'll love it!
Haitai! I just know today's gonna be a good one! I'm so excited, I feel like dancing!
With all the great friends I've got, every day's a blast! Sometimes it makes me wanna dance!
Let's take a trip to the beach! Nothing feels better than the water on your skin!
The water feels so great! C'mon, you should join me! I'll hold your hand so you don't fall!
Is anything better than dancing together? C'mon, you should join in too!
Ooh! Is it your birthday today? Then what are we waiting for? Let's get down to celebrating!

Happy birthday to you!
For your present, I'll perform
a non-stop birthday dance for
24 hours straight!
Don't forget, I'm still a teacher! If you need help with language, I'll tutor you! ♪
I teach language arts, but I wish romance novels and shojo manga could be subjects...
I have so many lovely memories of my demon school days. Take time to enjoy these moments!
Homework giving you trouble? I'll help! This sentence means... Hmm? I'm too close?
When we're out together, people always think we're a couple. I guess I don't really mind it, though…
I-I fell down. I need to get it together and be a better teacher, but I'm not there yet.
I'm not a token ditz character, you know. I just happen to slip up sometimes. Honestly!
I ran into a monster, but it blushed and fell over when it saw my face. I wonder why.
If I trip again, will you help me? Hee hee, I know I'm a teacher, but I keep needing you.
I wonder what my first boyfriend will be like? I hope he's like you, and helps when I fall.
Well, well. Happy birthday!\nYou're growing up so quickly.\nHere, let Miss Io give you a pat on the head to celebrate!
Here's to the birthday boy!\nI always thought it was the most romantic idea to propose to a guy on the day he comes of age...
Red, white, yellow... Such pretty flowers. ♪ Mr. Bug is buzzing, Mr. Butterfly fluttering! ♪
Mr. Bunny, ♪ Mr. Kitty, ♪\nMr. Doggy! ♪\nThey're all my friends. ♪
Are you going to play with me,\nMr. Nice Guy? Yay! I'm so happy! ♪
Mimi loooves Mr. Nice Guy! And the bunnies and flowers, too!
Mr. Nice Guy is the best! Here's a hug! Now you hug me back!
Mr. Mini-Gryphon is sooo fast! Whoosh! Hurry up, Mr. Nice Guy! ♪
I'm gonna make a flower crown. ♪ All for Mr. Nice Guy. ♪

Papa, Mama and my friends,
the critters and flowers,
and Mr. Nice Guy!
They're all my favorite things. ♪
This is my secret flower garden! But I'll tell you all about it, Mr. Nice Guy. After all, you're the best!
Mimi and Mr. Mini-Gryphon both love Mr. Nice Guy. ♪ I'm glad we're together! ♪
Happy birthday! ♪\nI wanna grow up fast so I can be Mr. Nice Guy's big sister. ♪
I'll sing you a birthday song. La la-la-la la la! ♪ Happy birthday, Mr. Nice Guy! ♪ You're the bestest ever! ♪
I feel a lot less nervous when I'm around you. *giggle* I give in to your kindness.
H-hey, I was wondering. How come you're always so nice to me?
I'm doing speech training so I can talk to others better. She sells seashells...
H-hey, wanna play house? I'll be the mom, and you be the dad!
Hee hee! You came to play with me again! I'm so happy!
So, umm... No, it's nothing! Never mind! Sorry to bug you...
*whine* D-do I have something on my face? Please don't stare like that!
I want to keep practicing in this forest for a while... I couldn't bear showing anyone until I improve…
*whimper* Don't stare at me... Oh, umm, but I don't want you to not look at me, either.
Umm, you see... I like to act out scenes and plays. It'd be nice if you'd watch me.
H-happy birthday! D-do you mind if I... give you this present?
Happy b-birthday!\nUm, it... it'd be nice if we could celebrate together...
S-so, umm, I wanted to ask you if... Uhh, on second thought, never mind!
A new game goes on sale today. If you want, we could play it t-tog... I can't!
With you I can kinda sorta talk okay, but I want to be able to do it better.
It feels normal being around you now. That's not special? I sure think it is.
Want to go shopping? Okay, good practice. Let's do this. Ack! D-did you overhear me?!
I-I didn't pick this flower just to show it to you or anything!
What a pretty meadow. I-I don't think I fit this backdrop... Oh, um, never mind.
I kinda like places like this, you know. I... am a girl, after all.
Since we have all these flowers here... He loves me, he loves me not... Eep!
Does bringing me here mean you're sort of treating me like a proper girl, maybe?
H-happy bir... birth... H... happy... Aaaahhh, it's no use! I can't say it to his face! How will I ever give him this present?!

H... happy... birthday!
I'll give you a special present...
if you can beat me at a game!
You're good at this game, right?
Pukichi's my dearest friend, so try to get along with him!
I came to the Orphanage first, so I'm like the big sister, and you're like my little brother!
You, me, and Pukichi! Together, we're unstoppable!
Pukichi was pretty annoyed at you 'cause you don't play with us enough.
Do you like Pukichi? I love him! Every bit as much as I love you!
W-wake up! Pukichi will clobber you if you don't watch where you're going!
Hi-yah! Back off, ya mangy monsters! Ack, no! Don't go near him!
Watch me, watch me! I've been practicing my Pukichi Fullswings! Check this out!
Hey! Are you hurt? Any wounds? It's okay now—Pukichi and I are here to help!
Stay away, you dumb monsters! Let's do this, Pukichi! "You got it, Ayane!"
Happy birthday! ♪ Pukichi wants to celebrate as well, so the three of us can have a birthday party for you!
Happy birthday! ♪ You're getting a present from both me and Pukichi! Must be nice to get so many!
Sorry I always mess up. I'll atone by committing seppuku! Huh? That'd be worse?
I'll attend to your every— Waahh! I... I bumped my head...
Cooking, laundry, cleaning... I've got so much to do, it's making my head spin!
I live to serve! Whatever you need, just say the word!
I'm going to try really hard to clean properly. If I do a good job, will you compliment me?
Poor little golem. Someone just abandoned it on the side of the road.
You're going to help me polish the golem? Hee hee. Thank you!
Are you injured? I'm very good at healing magic! Other magic... Not so much.
Oh no, I did it again! I promised myself I'd try harder not to mess up in front of you!
Welcome home, master. J-just joking around! Hee hee hee!
Happy birthday! I baked you a cake to celebrate! I-I'll carry it over nice and safely, okay?
Happy birthday! ♪ Do you mind if I celebrate not as a maid, but as just a regular friend?
Wish I could just laze about forever, honestly. Don't you agree?
Hey, c'mere. Kick back and play a game with me or something. You gotta make time to relax!
I'm starving. Got anything to eat? Preferably a sweet bun?
Usually I just lie around by myself. It's a lot more fun having you to play with.
Normally I'm not good with people entering my personal space. But you, I don't mind.
Have I died and gone to heaven? Do I really get to roll around in my beloved acorns?
Ahh, it's like this place was built just for me. I might not ever wanna leave.
Nothing beats a comfy bed, but being enveloped in nature's a close second.
Hey, over here! Come experience paradise with me. You can sit right here!
This place really is amazing. Way worth coming outside for. Thanks for bringing me here!
Happy birthday! And hey, I didn't forget your present. Should be delivered any minute now.
Happy birthday! It's a special day, so kick back and relax all you want. Naturally I'll be joining you, too.
I've poured my heart into this love potion. I'm thinking of you the whole time, my love.
My main job is a florist. My poison weed bouquets are quite popular right now.
Flowers are important. They support life and make fine ingredients. Pretty? If you say so.
When I think about how this potion'll let me do whatever I want to you... I love my work.
What a nice flower. He loves me, he adores me, he loves me, he adores me...
What sort of girl do you want? Should I be cheery? Chill? You do only want me, right?
Some monsters can read your mind and show a vision of your desires. What would my love see?
Look at me. Only at me. Even if another me appears, never take your eyes off me.
If an impostor of you showed up, I'd hang him up like a decoration. I need the real you.
What would you like me to be, my love? I can be your ideal woman. I love you to death.
I've baked a special cake for your birthday. The secret ingredient is sedatives, a dash of aphrodisiac... and of course, my undying love.
Happy birthday, my love. I got a few presents for you! A marriage application, a wedding ring, and\na lovely new home for two.
I found a store that sells crayons, coloring books, and blocks for cheap! Help me shop!
When cooking, you need to use every last bit of your ingredients. Waste not, want not!
Money is important, but I just want to see a smile on everyone's face. Including yours!
You and I should go somewhere fun sometime. Just as long as it's free, of course.
I want to have a tea party. You'll be invited, of course. It'll be lots of fun!
